text:
Question 67) During an expedition, a group of students was lost from his guide. Throughout the day this group was lost, without water and under sun, the students began to feel more and more thirsty. Consequently, the excretory system of these individuals has increased in one of their functional processes.
In this situation the excretory system of students
A) Increased glomerular filtration.
B) produced greater volume of urine.
C) produced urine with less urea.
D) produced urine with higher concentration of salts.
E) reduced the reabsorption of glucose and amino acids.
